io.atomix.core.lock

Interface DistributedLock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive, io.atomix.primitive.SyncPrimitive

    public interface DistributedLock
extends io.atomix.primitive.SyncPrimitive
    Asynchronous lock primitive.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitive

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncDistributedLock async() 
      io.atomix.utils.time.Version lock()
      Acquires the lock, blocking until it's available.

      Attempts to acquire the lock.

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        io.atomix.utils.time.Version lock()
        Acquires the lock, blocking until it's available.
        Returns:
        the acquired lock version

      • tryLock

        Optional<io.atomix.utils.time.Version> tryLock()
        Attempts to acquire the lock.
        Returns:
        indicates whether the lock was acquired

      • tryLock

        Optional<io.atomix.utils.time.Version> tryLock(Duration timeout)
        Attempts to acquire the lock for a specified amount of time.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout after which to give up attempting to acquire the lock
        Returns:
        indicates whether the lock was acquired

        void unlock()
        Unlocks the lock.
